reactionTime.meta_title: Free Reaction Time Test | Human Benchmark | Reaction time
reactionTime.meta_description: The Human Benchmark Reaction Time Test is a free online tool that accurately measures your response speed to visual
reactionTime.description:
When the red box turns greeen,click as quickly as you can.
Click anywhere to start.
reactionTime.about: Reaction Time Test is a simple tool specifically designed to measure your Reaction Time. The average Reaction Time is 273 ms, according to the data collected in Reaction Time Test so far. In addition to precisely measuring your Reaction Time. This is discussed in further detail on the the statistics page about Reaction Time. While an average Reaction Time may fall between 200 - 250ms, your computer could be adding 10 - 50ms on top. If you want, you can keep track of your scores, and see your full history of Reaction Time Test. Just perform at least 5 clicks and then save to record your Reaction Time Test data.

poster.title: Reaction Time Test
poster.scanQRCode: Scan QR code to test your reaction time

introduce.averageReactionDesc: The average reaction time for humans varies by age group:
introduce.definitionDesc: Reaction time is the interval between the presentation of a stimulus and the initiation of a response.
introduce.meaningDesc: Reaction time is a crucial measure of cognitive and motor function, reflecting how quickly an individual can process and respond to stimuli.
introduce.professionalDesc: Different professions require varying levels of reaction time performance:
introduce.animalDesc: Different animals have evolved various reaction times based on their survival needs:
introduce.reactionTimeAverage: The typical time it takes for a human to respond to a stimulus, usually ranging between 150-300 milliseconds.

sequence.meta_title: Free Sequence Memory Test Online ｜ Human Benchmark Test
sequence.meta_description: The Sequence Memory Test assesses your ability to recall sequences of numbers, colors, or shapes, and it's a valuable tool for measuring short-term memory.
sequence.about:
Sequence Memory Test is a valuable tool for measuring short-term memory.
Memorize the sequence of buttons that light up, then press them in order.
Every time you finish the pattern, it gets longer.
Make a mistake, and the test is over.

tutorial.step1: Watch the sequence of blue squares
tutorial.step3: Click the squares in the same order

aim.meta_title: Free Aim Trainer Online | Aim Test | Human Benchmark Test
aim.meta_description: Aim Trainer can test your aiming reaction time. With the help of it, you can improve your aiming skills so as to achieve rapid and precise aiming.
aim.description:
Hit 30 targets as quickly as you can.
Click the target above to begin
aim.about:
Click the targets as quickly and accurately as you can.
This tests reflexes and hand-eye coordination.
Once you've clicked 30 targets, your score and average time per target will be displayed.
This test is best taken with a mouse or tablet screen. Trackpads are difficult to score well with.

tutorial.step1: Click on the targets as they appear
tutorial.step2: React as quickly as possible - speed matters!
tutorial.step3: Targets will appear randomly across the screen
tutorial.step4: Complete 30 targets to see your average reaction time

numberMemory.meta_title: Free Number Memory Test Online | Human Benchmark Test
numberMemory.meta_description: The average person can remember 7 numbers at onece.Can you do more?
numberMemory.description: The average person can remember 7 numbers at onece.Can you do more?
numberMemory.about: The average person can only remember 7 digit numbers reliably, but it's possible to do much better using mnemonic techniques.

memory.meta_title: Free Visual Memory Test Online | Human Benchmark Test
memory.about:
Every level, a number of tiles will flash white. Memorize them, and pick them again after the tiles are reset!
Levels get progressively more difficult, to challenge your skills.
If you miss 3 tiles on a level, you lose one life.
You have three lives.
Make it as far as you can!

verbalMemory.meta_title: Free Verbal Memory Test Online | Human Benchmark Test
verbalMemory.meta_description: You will be shown words, one at a time.
verbalMemory.description: You will be shown words, one at a time.If you've seen a word during the test, click SEEN. If it's a new word, click NEW.
verbalMemory.about:
This test measures how many words you can keep in short term memory at once.
The number of words you need to remember grows continually, until you can't keep them in your head anymore.
Go as long as you can. You have 3 strikes until game over.
Your score is how many turns you lasted.

climp.meta_title: Free Chimp Test Online | Human benchmark Test | Chimp
climp.meta_description: Are You Smarter Than a Climp? Climp Test，Click the squares in order according to their numbers.The test will get progressively harder.
climp.h2:
Chimpanzee Test
Are You Smarter Than a Chimpanzee?
climp.description:
Click the squares in order according to their numbers.
The Chimpanzee Test will get progressively harder.
climp.about:
Chimpanzee Test is a test of working memory, made famous by a study that found that chimpanzees consistently outperform humans on this task.
In the study, the chimps consistently outperformed humans, and some chimps were able to remember 9 digits over 90% of the time.
This Chimpanzee Test is a variant of that concept, that gets increasingly difficult every turn, starting at 4 digits, and adding one every turn. If you pass a level, the number increases. If you fail, you get a strike. Three strikes and the test is over.

typing.meta_title: Free Typing Online | Human Benchmark Test | Typing test
typing.meta_description: This test measures your typing speed in words per minute. It's a simple and effective way to gauge your typing efficiency. The test will display your typing speed, and you can try multiple times to see your average performance.
typing.description: How many words per minute can you type?
typing.about: Typing Test measures your typing speed in words per minute. It's a simple and effective way to gauge your typing efficiency. The test will display your typing speed, and you can try multiple times to see your average performance.
sentences: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog, while nearby birds chirp melodiously in the morning sun. The gentle breeze rustles through the autumn leaves, creating a symphony of natural sounds. A curious squirrel watches from a nearby oak tree, its tiny paws clutching an acorn. The peaceful scene unfolds in the quiet countryside, where time seems to slow down and nature's beauty takes center stage.

Programming is the art of telling another human what one wants the computer to do, but it's also about solving complex problems through logical thinking and creative solutions. Writing clean, maintainable code requires careful consideration of future developers who will read and modify it. The best programmers understand that clarity and simplicity are just as important as functionality, and that documentation is an essential part of the development process.

Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts. Every setback provides an opportunity to learn and grow stronger, while every achievement serves as a stepping stone to greater challenges. The true measure of character lies not in how many times we succeed, but in how we respond to adversity and keep moving forward despite obstacles. Persistence and determination are more powerful than talent alone.

In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity, and those who persevere through challenges often discover hidden strengths they never knew they possessed. Every obstacle presents a chance to learn, adapt, and improve, shaping us into more resilient and capable individuals. The greatest achievements in history have often emerged from periods of significant hardship, proving that adversity can be a powerful catalyst for innovation and personal growth.

The only way to do great work is to love what you do and approach each task with passion and dedication. When we find purpose in our work, even the most challenging projects become opportunities for growth and creativity. True excellence comes from combining skill with genuine enthusiasm, pushing boundaries, and constantly striving to improve. Success follows naturally when we pursue our goals with both heart and mind fully engaged.

Technology continues to reshape our daily lives in ways we could never have imagined just a few decades ago. From artificial intelligence and machine learning to virtual reality and quantum computing, innovations are transforming how we work, communicate, and solve problems. As we embrace these advancements, it becomes increasingly important to consider their ethical implications and ensure that technological progress serves humanity's best interests while protecting individual privacy and promoting social equality.

The human mind's capacity for learning and adaptation is truly remarkable, constantly forming new neural connections and pathways as we acquire knowledge and skills. Through dedicated practice and persistent effort, we can master complex abilities that once seemed impossible. The brain's plasticity allows us to reshape our capabilities throughout our lives, proving that growth and improvement are always possible with the right mindset and consistent effort.

Environmental conservation has become one of the most critical challenges facing our global community today. As we witness the effects of climate change, deforestation, and pollution, it becomes increasingly clear that protecting our planet requires immediate and collective action. Every individual's choices and behaviors contribute to the larger picture, from reducing waste and conserving energy to supporting sustainable practices and environmental initiatives.

The art of effective communication involves not just speaking clearly, but also listening actively and empathetically to others' perspectives. Building strong relationships, whether personal or professional, depends on our ability to understand and respond thoughtfully to different viewpoints. The most successful communicators know that genuine connection comes from creating an atmosphere of trust, respect, and open dialogue.

Scientific discovery has always been driven by human curiosity and the desire to understand the world around us. From the smallest subatomic particles to the vast expanses of space, researchers continue to uncover new mysteries and challenge our existing knowledge. Each breakthrough brings us closer to understanding our place in the universe while raising new questions that inspire further exploration.

Cultural diversity enriches our global society by bringing together different perspectives, traditions, and ways of thinking. When we embrace and celebrate these differences, we create opportunities for innovation, creativity, and mutual understanding. Learning from other cultures broadens our horizons, challenges our assumptions, and helps us develop a more inclusive and empathetic worldview.

Leadership in the modern world requires a delicate balance of confidence and humility, vision and adaptability, decisiveness and collaboration. Effective leaders understand that their success depends not just on their own abilities, but on their capacity to inspire and empower others. They create environments where innovation flourishes, team members feel valued, and shared goals drive collective achievement.

The digital revolution has transformed how we access and share information, creating unprecedented opportunities for learning and connection. With vast knowledge available at our fingertips, the challenge becomes not finding information, but developing the critical thinking skills to evaluate and apply it effectively. Digital literacy has become essential for navigating our increasingly connected world.

Creative expression, whether through art, music, writing, or other forms, allows us to explore and communicate the full range of human experience. It serves as both a personal outlet and a universal language that transcends cultural boundaries. When we engage in creative activities, we develop new perspectives, process emotions, and contribute to the rich tapestry of human culture.

Building resilience involves developing the mental and emotional strength to face challenges, adapt to change, and recover from setbacks. It's not about avoiding difficulties, but rather learning to navigate them with grace and determination. Through experience and self-reflection, we can cultivate the inner resources needed to maintain balance and optimism in the face of adversity.

timePerception.meta_title: Free Time Perception Test Online | Time Test | Human Benchmark Test
timePerception.meta_description: Test your time perception ability.Measure the difference between the time you perceive and the actual time.
timePerception.about: Time Perception Test is a test of time perception ability. The Time Perception Test will display your time perception, and you can try multiple times to see your average performance.

colorPerception.meta_title: Free Color Perception Test Online | Color Test | Human Benchmark Test
colorPerception.about: Color Perception Test is a test of color perception ability. The Color Perception Test will display your color perception, and you can try multiple times to see your average performance.

colorBlindness.meta_title: Free Color Blindness Test Online | Human Benchmark Test
colorBlindness.meta_description: Test your color vision with these Ishihara plates
colorBlindness.description: Test your color vision with these Ishihara plates
colorBlindness.question: Question
colorBlindness.about: The Color Blindness Test uses Ishihara plates to test for color vision deficiencies. These tests work by hiding numbers or patterns within colored dots that are visible to people with normal color vision but may be difficult or impossible to see for those with color vision deficiencies.

result.normal: Your color vision appears to be normal.
result.slight: You may have slight color vision deficiency.
result.moderate: You may have moderate color vision deficiency.
result.severe: You may have severe color vision deficiency.

answers.redAndPinkLine: A red line and a pink line

grayShades.meta_description: Test your ability to distinguish subtle differences in gray shades.How many levels can you pass?
grayShades.description: How many levels can you pass?
grayShades.findDifferent: Find the square with a slightly different shade
grayShades.excellent: Excellent! You have exceptional gray shade perception!
grayShades.good: Good job! Your gray shade perception is above average.
grayShades.average: Not bad! You have average gray shade perception.
grayShades.needPractice: Keep practicing to improve your gray shade perception.
grayShades.about: The Shades of Gray Test measures your ability to distinguish subtle differences in gray shades. As you progress through levels, the differences become increasingly subtle, challenging your eye's ability to detect minor variations in brightness. The 51 Shades of Gray Test is particularly relevant for photographers, designers, and anyone working with grayscale images.

fiftyOneGrayShades.meta_description: Test your ability to distinguish subtle differences in gray shades. One wrong move ends the game!
fiftyOneGrayShades.description: Test your ability to distinguish subtle differences in gray shades. One wrong move ends the game!
fiftyOneGrayShades.clickInstruction: Click the squares in order from lightest to darkest shade. Choose carefully!

result.legendary: Legendary! Your gray shade perception is truly extraordinary. You can distinguish differences that most people cannot see!
result.exceptional: Exceptional! Your ability to perceive subtle gray variations is remarkable.
result.excellent: Excellent! You have superior gray shade perception.
result.good: Good job! You have above-average gray shade perception.
result.average: Not bad! You have average gray shade perception.
result.needPractice: Keep practicing! Gray shade perception can be improved with practice.

fiftyOneGrayShades.beginnerLevel: Beginner Level: Basic gray shade discrimination
fiftyOneGrayShades.about: This extremely challenging test measures your ability to distinguish incredibly subtle differences in gray shades. The difficulty increases dramatically with each level, with the final levels testing the absolute limits of human perception. One wrong move ends the game, demanding both exceptional visual acuity and unwavering confidence in your choices.

hearingTest.meta_description: Test your hearing age,Test your hearing frequency range from 20Hz to 20,000Hz
hearingTest.description: Test your hearing age,Test your hearing frequency range from 20Hz to 20,000Hz
hearingTest.testInstruction: Click 'Play Sound' and indicate whether you can hear it
hearingTest.frequencyRangeTitle: Normal Hearing Frequency Range by Age
hearingTest.about:
The human ear can typically hear frequencies between 20Hz and 20,000Hz. As we age, the upper limit of our hearing range gradually decreases. This test helps you understand your hearing frequency range.

Please use this test in a quiet environment and ensure your device's volume is at a comfortable level.

result.excellent: Excellent! Your hearing range is above average for your age.
result.good: Good! Your hearing range is normal for your age.
result.normal: Your hearing range is within normal limits.
result.needCheck: You might want to consult a hearing specialist for a professional check.

perfectPitch.meta_title: Free Perfect Pitch Test Online | Human Benchmark Test
perfectPitch.meta_description: Test your ability to identify musical notes by ear
perfectPitch.description: Test your ability to identify musical notes by ear
perfectPitch.about: Perfect pitch, or absolute pitch, is the ability to identify or recreate a musical note without any reference point. This test helps you assess and train your ability to recognize musical notes by ear. The test plays a single note, and you need to identify which note it is from the 12 notes in an octave.

faceRecognition.meta_title: Free Face Recognition Test Online | Human Benchmark Test
faceRecognition.meta_description: Test your face recognition ability，The higher the accuracy and the faster the speed, the stronger your right-brain ability is proven to be.
faceRecognition.description: Test your face recognition ability，The higher the accuracy and the faster the speed, the stronger your right-brain ability is proven to be.
faceRecognition.about: The Face Recognition Test is designed to measure your ability to recognize and remember human faces. Starting from Level 1 with a single face, the challenge progressively increases up to Level 9. In each level, you'll be shown faces to memorize, followed by a selection phase where you need to identify the faces you've seen before among new ones. This Face Recognition Test helps evaluate your facial recognition abilities, which is a crucial skill in social interactions and various professional fields. A score above 70% is required to advance to the next level. The Face Recognition Test measures both accuracy and reaction time, providing a comprehensive assessment of your face recognition capabilities.

cpt.meta_title: Continuous Performance Test（CPT-II）| Human Benchmark Test
cpt.description: Click anywhere on the screen when you see the letter "X"
cpt.duration: Continuous Performance Test will last for 5 minutes
cpt.aboutDescription: Continuous Performance Test (CPT) is a neuropsychological test that measures sustained attention, selective attention, and impulsivity. During Continuous Performance Test, participants are presented with a series of letters and must respond only to specific target stimuli while inhibiting responses to non-target stimuli.
cpt.resultsDescription: Continuous Performance Test Results provide insights into attention-related abilities and potential attention deficits.

create.title: Create Time Limited Visibility Message
create.description:
Create a time-limited visibility message with text, image, or video content.
Test his/her reaction time.
create.maxViewersHint: The maximum number of viewers who can successfully view the message
create.maxVisitorsHint: The maximum number of visitors who can visit the link
create.shareViaText: "{title}" is waiting for you to view it.
create.step1Description: Choose your message type (text, image, or video) and enter your content. Create a time-limited message that will challenge your recipients.
create.step2Description: Define how long your message will be visible and how many attempts viewers get. Time Limited Visibility lets you control the viewing experience.
create.step3Description: Get a unique link to your time-limited message and share it with anyone. Time Limited Visibility makes sharing exciting content easy.
create.viewStepsTitle: How to View a Time Limited Message
create.viewStep1Description: Click 'Ready' when you're prepared to view the time-limited content. Time Limited Visibility requires quick reactions.
create.viewStep2Description: Click when you see the envelope icon appear. Time Limited Visibility tests your reaction speed.
create.viewStep3Description: If you're fast enough, you'll get to see the time-limited message. Time Limited Visibility rewards quick reactions.
create.feature1Description: Set precise visibility durations for your content with Time Limited Visibility controls.
create.feature2Description: Control how many times viewers can attempt to access your Time Limited Message.
create.feature3Description: Share your Time Limited Visibility content across any platform with a simple link.

view.meta_title: You've got a Time Limited Visibility Message
view.meta_description: Click the screen before the icon disappears to view the content of the Time Limited Visibility message.
view.notFoundDescription: This message may have been deleted or the link is invalid
view.expiredDescription: The viewing time for this message has ended
view.pageDescription: Tap the screen before the icon disappears to view the content of the message.
view.waitForIcon: Tap the screen as quickly as you can when the icon appears
view.tooSoonDescription: The click is valid only after the icon appears.
view.iconShownDescription: The icon will disappear in {visibleDuration} ms.
view.tooSlowDescription:
The reaction time set for the message is {requiredTime}ms, your reaction time is {reactionTime}ms
you still have {attempts} chances.
view.successDescription: The reaction time set for the message is {requiredTime}ms, your reactiontime is {reactionTime}ms.
view.timeoutDescription:
The reaction time set for the message is {requiredTime}ms,
You should have clicked the screen before the icon disappears.
You still have {attempts} chances.
view.maxAttemptsDescription: You've reached the maximum number of attempts.
view.waitTitle: Waiting for the icon to appear
view.clickTitle: Tap the screen to view the message
view.clickDescription:
The sender has set the time for the appearance of the open icon.
You need to tap the screen before the icon disappears to view the content of the message.
view.maxVisitorsDescription: Sorry, this message has reached its maximum number of visitors
view.maxViewersDescription: Sorry, this message has reached its maximum number of viewers
view.accessDeniedDescription: Sorry, you cannot access this message
